TermDefinition.DefinitionText: A substance that is being studied in the treatment of cancer. It belongs to the family of drugs called glycinamide ribonucleotide formyl transferase inhibitors.

SpanishTermDefinition.DefinitionText: Sustancia en estudio para el tratamiento del cáncer. Es un tipo de inhibidor de la glicinamida ribonucleótido formiltransferasa.
